name: Alien Hazard
description:
NOTE: For Mac OS build to work, you should "Allow apps dopnloaded from anywhere" in System Preferences > Security & Privacy.

Latest update (v1.10):

  • Grenades! Now you can keep right mouse button to ready a grenade and release to throw. The more you keep pressed, the further you can throw.
  • New UI! With weapon pictures! wohoo!
  • Some modifications to the power up system. Fast fire power up out, Super weapon power up in.

Aliens have invaded and they are turning people into zombies! That would have been a problem but luckily it's a weekday, so get to work!

FEATURES

  • 8 Weapons!
  • 9 Power ups!
  • 4 Enemy Types!
  • Grenades!
  • Minimap!

HOW TO PLAY

  • WASD to move
  • Left Mouse to fire
  • Right Mouse to throw grenades (Keep pressed)
  • Left Shift to Sprint
  • R to reload (don't bother, it reloads automatically)
  • Pick up the weapons and power up, and don't be alien food! (They don't eat humans, right? Right?)

previous updates:

v1.05:

  • Resolved the collision problem: bullets no longer occasionally pass through monsters
  • Fixed the accuracy display at the end game menu
  • Fixed typo in main menu
